Class GymService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.GymService
All Implemented Interfaces:
GymServiceInterface
public class GymService extends Object implements GymServiceInterface
Service class for managing gym centers. Handles tasks such as viewing centers, adding new centers (pending approval), updating center details, and administrative approvals/rejections.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GymService()
    Instantiates a new gym service and initializes the DAOs.

  • Method Details

    • viewAllCenters

      public List<GymCenter> viewAllCenters(String city)
      Retrieves all approved gym centers in a specific city.
      Specified by:
      viewAllCenters in interface GymServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      city - the name of the city
      Returns:
      a list of approved gym centers in that city

    • isCenterAvailable

      public boolean isCenterAvailable(int centerId, Date date)
      Checks if a gym center is available and approved for booking.
      Specified by:
      isCenterAvailable in interface GymServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center
      date - the date of interest
      Returns:
      true if the center exists and is approved, false otherwise

    • addGymCenter

      public boolean addGymCenter(GymCenter center)
      Adds a new gym center to the system. The center will be in a pending state until approved by an admin.
      Parameters:
      center - the GymCenter object containing details
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful

    • updateGymCenter

      public boolean updateGymCenter(GymCenter center)
      Updates the details of an existing gym center.
      Parameters:
      center - the GymCenter object with updated details
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false if center not found

    • getCenterById

      public GymCenter getCenterById(int centerId)
      Retrieves center details by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the center
      Returns:
      the GymCenter object

    • getCentersByOwner

      public List<GymCenter> getCentersByOwner(int ownerId)
      Retrieves all gym centers owned by a specific owner ID.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - the user ID of the gym owner
      Returns:
      a list of gym centers

    • getPendingApprovals

      public List<GymCenter> getPendingApprovals()
      Retrieves all gym centers currently awaiting administrative approval.
      Returns:
      a list of pending gym centers

    • approveCenterRegistration

      public boolean approveCenterRegistration(int centerId)
      Approves a gym center's registration request.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center to approve
      Returns:
      true if approval was successful

    • rejectCenterRegistration

      public boolean rejectCenterRegistration(int centerId)
      Rejects a gym center's registration request, effectively deleting it.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center to reject
      Returns:
      true if rejection was successful

    • getAllCenters

      public List<GymCenter> getAllCenters()

      Returns:
      a list of all gym centers

      Returns:
      a list of approved gym centers

      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the center to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful
